mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`BRANCH`, t1.`BUGS`, t1.`BUILDER`, t1.BUILDER AS `BUILDERPK`, t1.`BUILDSN`, t1.`CREATEBY`, t1.`DATE`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`DEPT`, t1.`DEPTNAME`, t1.`DESC`, t1.`FILEPATH`, t1.`ID`, t1.`NAME`, t1.`ORG`, t1.`ORGNAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t11.`name` AS `PRODUCTNAME`, t1.`PROJECT`, t1.`SCMPATH`, t1.`STORIES`, t1.`UPDATEBY` FROM `zt_build` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_product` t11 ON t1.`PRODUCT` = t11.`productsn`

select t1.* from (select 0 as `BRANCH`, '' as `BUILDER`, null as `DATE`, '0' AS `DELETED`, '' AS `FILEPATH`, 100000000 AS `ID`, 'trunk' AS `IDs`, '主干' AS `NAME`, null AS `PRODUCT`, '' AS `PRODUCTNAME`, null as `PROJECT`, '' AS `SCMPATH` from dual union all SELECT t1.`BRANCH`, t1.`BUILDER`, t1.`DATE`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`FILEPATH`, t1.`ID`, t1.`ID` AS `IDS`, (case when (select tt.`name` from zt_release tt where tt.build = t1.id and tt.deleted = '0' order by tt.date desc LIMIT 0,1) is null then t1.`name` else (select tt.`name` from zt_release tt where tt.build = t1.id and tt.deleted = '0' order by tt.date desc LIMIT 0,1) end) AS `NAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t11.`NAME` AS `PRODUCTNAME`, t1.`PROJECT`, t1.`SCMPATH` FROM `zt_build` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_product t11 ON t1.PRODUCT = t11.ID where not EXISTS(select 1 from zt_release t2 where t2.build = t1.id and t2.`status` = 'terminate')) t1
AND t1.DELETED = '0'
AND ( t1.`PRODUCT` = #{srf.datacontext.bugproduct} OR t1.`PRODUCT` = #{srf.webcontext.bugproduct} or t1.`PRODUCT` is null)
AND ( t1.`PROJECT` = #{srf.datacontext.bugproject} or t1.`PROJECT` is null or #{srf.datacontext.bugproject} is null)

SELECT t1.`BRANCH`, t1.`BUILDER`, t1.`DATE`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`FILEPATH`, t1.`ID`, t1.`ID` AS `IDS`, (case when (select tt.`name` from zt_release tt where tt.build = t1.id and tt.deleted = '0' order by tt.date desc LIMIT 0,1) is null then t1.`name` else (select tt.`name` from zt_release tt where tt.build = t1.id and tt.deleted = '0' order by tt.date desc LIMIT 0,1) end) AS `NAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t11.`NAME` AS `PRODUCTNAME`, t1.`PROJECT`, t1.`SCMPATH` FROM `zt_build` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_product t11 ON t1.PRODUCT = t11.ID
AND t1.DELETED = '0'
AND ( t1.`PRODUCT` = #{srf.datacontext.bugproduct} OR t1.`PRODUCT` = #{srf.webcontext.bugproduct} or t1.`PRODUCT` is null)
AND ( t1.`PROJECT` = #{srf.datacontext.bugproject} or t1.`PROJECT` is null or #{srf.datacontext.bugproject} is null)
AND not EXISTS(select 1 from zt_release t2 where t2.build = t1.id and t2.`status` = 'terminate')

SELECT t1.`BRANCH`, t1.`BUILDER`, t1.BUILDER AS `BUILDERPK`, t1.`BUILDSN`, t1.`CREATEBY`, t1.`DATE`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`DEPT`, t1.`DEPTNAME`, t1.`FILEPATH`, t1.`ID`, t1.`NAME`, t1.`ORG`, t1.`ORGNAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t11.`name` AS `PRODUCTNAME`, t1.`PROJECT`, t1.`SCMPATH`, t1.`UPDATEBY` FROM `zt_build` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_product` t11 ON t1.`PRODUCT` = t11.`productsn`
AND t1.DELETED = '0'
AND ( ( t1.`PRODUCT` = #{srf.datacontext.product} OR t1.`PRODUCT` = #{srf.webcontext.product} ) )

SELECT t1.`BRANCH`, t1.`BUILDER`, t1.BUILDER AS `BUILDERPK`, t1.`BUILDSN`, t1.`CREATEBY`, t1.`DATE`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`DEPT`, t1.`DEPTNAME`, t1.`FILEPATH`, t1.`ID`, t1.`NAME`, t1.`ORG`, t1.`ORGNAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t11.`name` AS `PRODUCTNAME`, t1.`PROJECT`, t1.`SCMPATH`, t1.`UPDATEBY` FROM `zt_build` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_product` t11 ON t1.`PRODUCT` = t11.`productsn`
AND t1.DELETED = '0'

SELECT t1.`BRANCH`, t1.`BUILDER`, t1.`DATE`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`FILEPATH`, t1.`ID`, case when (select t2.`name` from zt_release t2 where t2.build = t1.id and t2.deleted = '0' ORDER BY t2.date desc LIMIT 0,1) is null then t1.`name` else (select t2.`name` from zt_release t2 where t2.build = t1.id and t2.deleted = '0' ORDER BY t2.date desc LIMIT 0,1) end as `NAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t11.`NAME` AS `PRODUCTNAME`, t1.`PROJECT`, t1.`SCMPATH` FROM `zt_build` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_product t11 ON t1.PRODUCT = t11.ID
AND t1.DELETED = '0'

SELECT t1.`BRANCH`, t1.`BUILDER`, t1.BUILDER AS `BUILDERPK`, t1.`BUILDSN`, t1.`CREATEBY`, t1.`DATE`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`DEPT`, t1.`DEPTNAME`, t1.`FILEPATH`, t1.`ID`, t1.`NAME`, t1.`ORG`, t1.`ORGNAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t11.`name` AS `PRODUCTNAME`, t1.`PROJECT`, t1.`SCMPATH`, t1.`UPDATEBY` FROM `zt_build` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_product` t11 ON t1.`PRODUCT` = t11.`productsn`
AND t1.DELETED = '0'
AND ( FIND_IN_SET(t1.id,(select tt.builds from zt_testreport tt where tt.id = #{srf.webcontext.srfparentkey})) )

SELECT t1.`BRANCH`, t1.`BUGS`, t1.`BUILDER`, t1.`DATE`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`DESC`, t1.`FILEPATH`, t1.`ID`, CONCAT_WS('','PMS ',t1.`name`,' 主要更新') as `NAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t11.`NAME` AS `PRODUCTNAME`, t1.`PROJECT`, t1.`SCMPATH`, t1.`STORIES`, t1.BUILDSN FROM `zt_build` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_product t11 ON t1.PRODUCT = t11.productsn
AND t1.deleted = '0'

SELECT t1.`BRANCH`, t1.`BUGS`, t1.`BUILDER`, t1.BUILDER AS `BUILDERPK`, t1.`BUILDSN`, t1.`CREATEBY`, t1.`DATE`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`DEPT`, t1.`DEPTNAME`, t1.`DESC`, t1.`FILEPATH`, t1.`ID`, t1.`NAME`, t1.`ORG`, t1.`ORGNAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t11.`name` AS `PRODUCTNAME`, t1.`PROJECT`, t1.`SCMPATH`, t1.`STORIES`, t1.`UPDATEBY` FROM `zt_build` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_product` t11 ON t1.`PRODUCT` = t11.`productsn`
AND t1.DELETED = '0'
